title: Graphic Design in Architecture (Art Ebook).pdf
description:
Graphic Design in Architecture by Jie Zhou
English/Chinese | 2011 | 432 pages | PDF | 48.9 MB

The book provides an extensive snapshot of the current work in this emerging vital field - graphic design in architecture. Many leading design firms contributed their projects in the book.

Absolutely gorgeous fullspread color images, with notes, of notable "informational design" and visual communication techniques in the context of modern, contemporary architecture. Varied, international examples provide the rationale for thoughtful graphic design in architectural practice.
Venues include Medical, Retail, Sport, Transit, Arts and Education locations
